alert.note: Alert for Duval; La Salle (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:03PM CDT until April 05 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN DUVAL...SOUTHEASTERN LA SALLE...NORTHEASTERN WEBB AND SOUTHERN MCMULLEN COUNTIES... At 1002 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles west of Loma Alta, or 17 miles north of Freer, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Duval, southeastern La Salle, northeastern Webb and southern McMullen Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
